testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design style initial details screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test submit order details in Style Initial details screen
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then click on the Merchandising Module......................................passed And click on Data Entry dropdown............................................passed And click on the Style Initail Details screen...............................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed And Select IPO..............................................................passed And Verify whether the Combo field is prepopulated with data or not.........passed And Verify whether the Garment Size type field data is displayed or not.....passed Given User enter the data in PO Qty field...................................passed And Enter the data in IPO% field............................................passed And Click on the submit button..............................................passed And Verify the validation msg is displaying or not..........................passed
